Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
common_ev_Двери в красные комнаты разбло: The doors to the red rooms are unlocked!
This is not what I need.
common_ev_Ах ты зараза!\\! Сейчас я тебя: Oh, you're a pest!\! Now I...\^
common_ev_Я помню, как разбирал такую па:
I remember how I disassembled such a panel at the applied
mechanics!
common_ev_Даже я смогу починить её!\\! В:
Even I can fix it!\!
All I need to do is find a solid foundation,
and replace it in the control panel.
common_ev_Здесь много ящиков с инструмен:
There are a lot of toolboxes here.\!
Somewhere there must be this detail.
common_ev_Эффекты расходников можно испо: The effects of consumables can be used outside of combat.
There's only junk in the box.
common_ev_Штаб Вероломгеров в другой сто: The Werolomgers' headquarters is on the other side.
The number of charges is higher than normal. 
The Medina mechanism is overloaded. Attempting 
treatment will cause the device to detonate.
common_ev_Сбросить показатель энергии до: Reset the energy indicator to the standard value?
common_ev_Здоровье отряда восстановлено!: The squad's health has been restored!
common_ev_Заряд лечения закончился! Треб:
The healing charge has ended!
Needs recharging!
common_ev_Заряд энергии восстановлен! По:
The energy charge has been restored!
Lost Hydrite Shard!
common_ev_Вы уверены, что хотите потрати: Are you sure you want to spend a hydrite shard to charge?
common_ev_Стой! \\!Вы оба, следуйте за м:
Stop! \!Both of you, follow me to commander Ricard's
office!
common_ev_Вы двое, притормозите! \\!За н:
You two, slow down!\!For disturbing the peace
Purgatory, Irni must go with me to Laurita,
and you Riom\..\..\.. for company.
common_ev_Да, так лучше.\\! Спасибо, Тин: Yes, that's better.\! Thank you, Tini.
common_ev_Отправиться в мир Коельтана?: Go to the world of Koeltan?
common_ev_Я должен позвонить отцу когда:
I should call my dad when I'm in the South Canyon on
base of the Rivalser Intelligence Corps.
common_ev_Отец?\\. Пап, ты меня слышишь?: Father?\. Dad, can you hear me?
common_ev_РИОМ?!\\. Слава Богу, ты жив\\:
RIOM?!\.
Thank God you are alive\..\..\..
How is your situation? Badly injured?
common_ev_Со мной всё в порядке.\\. Я це:
Everything is fine with me.\.
I'm as safe as can be.
common_ev_А вот обстановка.\\..\\.. не о:
But the situation.\..\.. is not very good. There are 
a lot of devastators around. There are reaper bodies 
everywhere, and I don't know exactly where to go.
common_ev_О нет\\..\\..\\.. Ты находишьс:
Oh no\..\..\.. You are in the North Region of 
Jagged Canyon.\. According to intelligence, this is 
a dangerous place. The only thing worse is the Southern 
region or the Dark Forest.
common_ev_Так, сын, слушай внимательно!:
So, son, listen carefully!
The Risen army is hundreds of kilometers away from you.
This is both bad and good.
common_ev_С одной стороны, ты рискуешь п:
On the one hand, you risk failing
Your squad has a task\..\..\..
common_ev_С другой, у тебя есть возможно:
On the other hand, you have the opportunity to collect 
scattered the powers of the reapers.
common_ev_В смысле, собрать силы?!\\. Ты:
What do you mean, gather strength?!\.
Do you want me to lead an army of a couple hundred reapers?
common_ev_Нет! Нет!\\. Я не это имел вви:
No no!\.
That's not what I meant.
common_ev_Помоги им с чем нужно и объясн:
Help them with whatever they need and explain the 
situation if they don't understand what's going on.
common_ev_Походу дела, продвигайся в сто:
As things go, move towards the South Canyon to the base
my warriors - the Rivalser Survey Corps.
This place is the rallying point for the remaining troops of Purgatory.
When you arrive, you will be able to strike at the Risen.
common_ev_Спасибо, отец! Как буду на мес:
Thank you, father!
I'll let you know when I'm there.
common_ev_Конечно, Риом. Жду твоего след: Of course, Riom. I'm waiting for your next call.
common_ev_Не стоит отвлекать вероломгера: Do not distract the Werolomgers person without reason.
common_ev_Вероломгер Ирей, это Риом Рури: Werolomger Irey, this is Riom Ruri!
common_ev_Звони мне только если увидишь:
Only call me if you see anything unusual,
that I have never seen before.
common_ev_О!\\. Давно тебя не было слышн:
Oh!\. I haven’t heard from you for a long time. 
I know, the campaign failed\..\..\.. I'm sorry about your 
squad\..\..\.. Almost the entire battalion destroyed\..\..\..
common_ev_Ага.\\. Дюжина раненых и полсо:
Yeah.\. A dozen wounded and fifty survivors.
I don't know where they went. But if you meet
them, help them get to the nearest outpost.
common_ev_Не позволь им разбить лагерь г:
Don't let them set up camp somewhere under the rocks in
Jagged Canyon. They'll quickly run to the smell of blood
devastators.
common_ev_Буду признателен, если сделаеш: I would appreciate it if you do as I say.
common_ev_Сидрин рассказал о базе развед: Sidrin told about the intelligence base in the Southern region?
common_ev_Да, отец говорил, что на Юге е:
Yes, father said that in the South there is a meeting point for all the reapers.
From there I can strike at the Risen\..\..\..
And kill them.
common_ev_Нет, я без понятия, что это за: No, I have no idea what kind of base this is.
common_ev_Точка сбора жнецов в Южном рай:
Reapers' rally point in the southern region of Jagged Canyon.
Sidrin's scouts are there now.
common_ev_Хорошо. Если не уверен, что те:
Okay. If you're not sure what you should do -
consult Sidrin.\.
And I will help with problems of a magical nature.
common_ev_Если увидишь что-то крайне нео:
If you see something extremely unusual that you have never seen before
once\..\..\.. or phenomena that you yourself cannot understand.\.
Don't hesitate - let me know right away.
common_ev_Благодарю за заботу, Ирей!: Thank you for your concern, Irey!
common_ev_Сейчас нет причин звонить кома: There's no reason to call the commander now.
common_ev_Командир Рикард, это Риом Рури: Commander Ricard, this is Riom Ruri!
common_ev_О! Ты ещё жив?\\. Неплохо для:
Oh! Are you still alive?\.
Not a bad start.
common_ev_Помощь! Я застрял в Северном к:
Help! I'm stuck in the North Canyon\..\..\.. my
the detachment was defeated\..\..\..
common_ev_Я дал тебе одно из самых смерт:
I gave you one of the deadliest weapons - the Genome
Morkret. You were far from weak fighters.\.
I don't care about the rest.
common_ev_К твоему счастью, настроение у: Luckily for you, I'm in a good mood.
common_ev_Опустошители наконец-то сделал:
The devastators have finally done their greatest stupidity -
united with the Risen, which means\..\..\..
We can legally exterminate them!
common_ev_Ха-ха-ха!\\.\\. Эти твари давн: Ha ha ha!\.\. These creatures have been asking for a long time.
common_ev_(Как тебя самого за такие мысл: (How were you not executed for such thoughts?)
common_ev_Командир, из-за этого союза мы:
Commander, because of this alliance we are suffering such losses,
which did not exist in the First Adamant War.
common_ev_Я постараюсь найти иной способ:
I will try to find another way to solve the problem with
devastators. But with the Risen I am alone
can't cope.
common_ev_Дерзай!\\. Весь карательный ко:
Go for it!\. The entire punitive corps moves to the side
South area of Jagged Canyon. Move there and maybe
even who you cross paths with.
common_ev_Если рядом с тобой будут карат: If there are punitive forces near you, I will inform you.
common_ev_До связи и\\..\\..\\.. постара: Until we get in touch and\..\..\.. try not to die.
common_ev_Недавно ты говорил, что расска:
You recently said that you would tell me
why you attacked me.
common_ev_Ммм\\..\\..\\.. насчет этого\\:
Mmm\..\..\.. about that\..\..\.. I wanted to know who you are.
See what you are like.
common_ev_Ради этого?! Мог бы, просто ус:
For this?! You could just arrange peaceful
gatherings around the fire! \.\.Like now! \!
Do you have to beat me half to death?
common_ev_Почему бы и нет? Для тебя это: Why not? This is not the first time for you.
common_ev_Странное у тебя приветствие. С:
Your greeting is strange.
First you beat me up, and then, as if nothing 
had happened, you invited me for tea.
common_ev_Обычное мужское приветствие, в:
The usual male greeting, in my time
everyone did it.
common_ev_Да и я узнал о тебе достаточно: Yes, and I learned enough about you.
common_ev_Лучший способ узнать человека:
The best way to get to know a person is to plunge
them into the abyss of despair and see
how they get out.
What they will do to survive.
common_ev_Твой выпад с голыми кулаками\\:
Your bare-fisted attack\..\..\.. It\..\..\..
Ha ha ha! \.I liked it! \.
I haven't seen such a will to live for a long time.
common_ev_Ты достоин владеть мечом. \\!О:
You are worthy to wield thr sword.\!
All that remains is to improve your skills.
common_ev_С-спасибо\\..\\..\\.. Но все ж:
Th-thank you\..\..\.. But still\..\..\..
Is it really that simple?
common_ev_Почему никто из карателей не с:
Why none of the punishers could pass
this challenge?
common_ev_Предыдущие жнецы так поддавали:
Previous reapers gave in to despair so much,
that they stopped resisting in any way. \!
Despite the fact that all the arms and legs are in place,
the heart is still beating\..\..\..
common_ev_Кто-то всерьез пытался от меня:
Someone was seriously trying to escape from me,
someone stood like a pillar and fell to their knees. \!
There were those who started with tears
eyes beg for mercy\..\..\..
common_ev_Чем больше Рикард отправлял ис:
The more Ricard sent test subjects,
the less worthy I saw.
common_ev_По итогу все дошло до ультимат:
As a result, everything came to an ultimatum - either he
will personally find me a worthy reaper\..\..\..
or we can forget about the power of Genom Morkret.
common_ev_И что во мне такого особенного: And what is so special about me?
common_ev_Нет\\..\\..\\.. Я помню. Мое т:
No\..\..\.. I remember. My body was created from dead
flesh, like all reapers. \.
But the soul is completely human. \!
What's wrong with that?..
common_ev_Серьезно? Черт\\..\\..\\.. хор:
Seriously? Damn\..\..\.. you are well
trained\..\..\..
common_ev_У тебя больше свободы, чем у л:
You have more freedom than any higher
reaper!
It seems\..\..\.. this is what they fear most\..\..\..
common_ev_Что-то мы засиделись\\..\\..\\:
For some reason we stayed too long\..\..\..
If you have no business with me, then it’s time for you to leave.
common_ev_(Шепотом)Пытаюсь попасть на ве: (Whispers) I'm trying to get to the top.
common_ev_Не-не-не. Не позорься. Если те:
No, no, no. Don't embarrass yourself. If you need to get
to a hill\..\..\.. without outside help,
come to me, in any safe place.
common_ev_Теперь стань по центру и замах:
Now stand in the center and swing in such a way
that the sword is right above your head.
common_ev_Риом взял меч в обе руки и зам: Riom took the sword in both hands and swung it.
common_ev_Жнец ощутил прилив темной энер: The Reaper felt a rush of dark energy.
common_ev_Целительная.\\. Чистая энергия: Healing.\. Clean energy.\. Somewhere below us.
common_ev_Прекрасно. \\!Теперь бы пещеру: Wonderful. \!Now I wish I could find a cave.
common_ev_Необязательно искать. \\.Ты мо: No need to search. \.You can do it yourself.
common_ev_И как ты себе это представляеш:
And how do you imagine this?\|
Do you propose to pick up the ground with a sword?
common_ev_Хах! Я бы на это посмотрел. \\: Hah! I would look at that. \.There is a better option.
common_ev_Вооружись моим мечом и подойди: Arm yourself with my sword and go to that crack.
common_ev_Ваша задача - отбить атаку опу:
Your task is to repel the attack of the devastators and save
barrier strength by at least 5%.
common_ev_В вашем распоряжении будут два: You will have two types of combat consumables at your disposal.
common_ev_Взрывной слиток. Он наносит ур:
Explosive Ingot. It deals 1 damage and it's 
recovered quickly. Maximum quantity - 10 pieces
common_ev_Магический слиток. Он наносит:
Magic ingot. It deals 2 damage, but it's
recovered slowly. Maximum quantity - 4 pieces.
common_ev_Для броска взрывного слитка на:
To throw an explosive ingot, press one of the keys -
\C[3]'Z', 'Space' \C[0]or \C[3]'Enter'.
common_ev_Для броска магического слитка:
To throw a magic ingot, press one of the keys -
\C[2]'X', 'Num 0', \C[0]or \C[2]'Esc'.
common_ev_Почему бы нам не попробовать о: Why don't we try to get around it?
common_ev_Не видишь, тут километровая пр: Don’t you see, there’s a kilometer-long gap here?!
common_ev_Ой!\\. По форме очень похожа н:
Oh!\.
The shape is very similar to a\..\..\.. leg?!
common_ev_Это Колосс.\\. Гигантский опус:
This is the Colossus.\.
A giant devastator that sometimes roams the silver
desert.
common_ev_Боюсь, в обход у нас не получи: I'm afraid we won't be able to bypass the arachnoids.
common_ev_Без слитка атаки этот камень м:
Without an attack ingot, this stone is not for me
move.
